table.name: vtiger_cbsignature
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_cbsignature` ( `cbsignatureid` int(11) NOT NULL, `signatureno` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `signaturename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `signaturetype` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `elementtype` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `ws` varchar(6) DEFAULT NULL, `nodeexec` varchar(5) DEFAULT NULL, `signaturesconfig` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `scriptname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `celery` varchar(5) DEFAULT NULL, `conditionmap` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `permissionmap` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `causale` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `modules` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `block` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `signaturestatus` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `sigtrigger` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `sig_type` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `execution_type` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `scheduled` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `scheduledtime` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `parametersmap` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `onerrorcallback` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `iomap` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `immutable` varchar(5) DEFAULT NULL, `sig_range` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `scheduleddate` date DEFAULT NULL, `sig_outputtype` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`cbsignatureid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_cbsignaturecf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_cbsignaturecf` ( `cbsignatureid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cbsignatureid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
